column4: does vmware work in ubuntu 8.04 now? or is it still only working in 7.10?
does vmware work in ubuntu 8.04 now? or is it still only working in 7.10?
they give you a script to use to recompile the kernel module. it has always worked.
something like: sudo vmware-config.pl (check to see if that exists first though) and answer the questions
